page.title: 13Sidcup Art & Leisure Centre
page.content: { Mr. Edward Heath M.P.}has backed the new Sidcup Arts and Leisure Centre. This has caused{many problems,}so Mr.Heath has to find a solution to keep everyone happy. The people living in the area of the Centre{do not like the idea}of the Centre being built next to them. They are{concerned over several aspects}of the Centre, in particular the arrangements for car parking and the fact that the Centre will disturb the area. The Leisure Centre will{bring more {activities into the area.}It will not only be used for orchestral and choral performances but also for dinner dances, conferences, exhibitions and other similar occasions. { The Centre is still under discussion.
